Module com.example.demo1
Package data

Class ItemDAO

java.lang.Object
data.AbstractDAO<Items>
data.ItemDAO
public class ItemDAO extends AbstractDAO<Items>
The ItemDAO class provides data access methods for interacting with the Items table in the database. It extends the AbstractDAO class, inheriting common database operations.
